acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Name: Insured Person1
acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Description: Any person named on the Schedule of Cover who is eligible to be Insured and for whom premium has been paid.

acord:Calculation.acord:Name: Premium1
acord:Calculation.acord:Description: This calculation creates a money provision which will be the role player for the premium role. This calculation uses the output from the loan schedule calculation at the level of the parent product. The loan schedule calculation produces a LoanBalanceCalculator object from which the premium calculation can obtain the loan balance amounts of which a percentage needs to be insured under this Protected Life coverage. The insured amounts are finally input to a CreditLifePremiumCalculator which finally calculates the insurance premiums for this coverage.

acord:RequestSpecification.acord:Name: Quote for Insurance1
acord:RequestSpecification.acord:Description: An approximate premium value for the coverages selected by the policy holder, based on a reduced set of information.

acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Name: Billing Account
acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Description: This represents the accounts that will be debited and credited for bills raised and premiums collected.

acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Name: Billing Scheduler1
acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Description: The Billing Scheduler is responsible for setting up the 'payment due' from a customer.

acord:PropertySpecification.acord:Name: Billing Frequency
acord:PropertySpecification.acord:Description: Determines how often each year an event will occur

acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Name: Collection Scheduler1
acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Description: Process to collect premium payment from the policyholder

acord:PropertySpecification.acord:Name: Payment Method
acord:PropertySpecification.acord:Description: Method by which premium is paid by policyholder

acord:PropertySpecification.acord:Name: Specific Collection Day
acord:PropertySpecification.acord:Description: Day of the month on which the premium is collected

acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Name: Policyholder5
acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Description:
A person or an organization that has an insurance policy. The policyholder receives the specific types of coverage (comprehensive, third party etc.) stated in the policy, subject to the payment of premiums, usually on a monthly basis. It is important to note that a policyholder does not make any legally enforceable promises when he/she takes out a policy. Specifically, the insurance company cannot legally compel the policyholder to pay his/her premiums; its only recourse is to stop coverage. On the other hand, the policyholder can force the insurance company to provide coverage if it refuses to do so, provided he/she has in fact paid premiums.
(A party who owns an insurance policy).

acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Name: Premium Payer1
acord:RoleSpecification.acord:Description: A party who pays the premium due under an agreement.
